trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una clase base de editor de componentes para los controles de servidor Web derivados de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />.

trans-unit.source: A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
trans-unit.target: Un editor de componentes proporciona una interfaz de usuario para editar las propiedades de un control.

trans-unit.source: Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: Los editores de componentes se invocan desde los diseñadores de controles mediante el **el generador de propiedad** elemento de menú en el menú contextual en el control.

trans-unit.source: Component editors that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Los editores de componentes que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> clase se invocan desde diseñadores derivados de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> clase y se utilizan para editar las propiedades de los controles que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener ejemplos de estos controles, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método muestra un editor de componentes para el control asociado, si se debe crear uno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> método devuelve el índice de la página inicial que se mostrará en el editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
trans-unit.target: Índice de la página inicial que se va a mostrar en la matriz de tipos de control de página.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Un diseñador que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> clase crea un editor de componentes que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> (clase), cuando el usuario selecciona **el generador de propiedad** en el menú contextual en el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que puede utilizarse para obtener más información de contexto.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, which represents the component to edit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que implementa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, que representa el componente que se va a editar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> that represents the parent window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> que representa la ventana principal.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.
trans-unit.target: Edita el componente especificado mediante el descriptor de contexto y la ventana principal que se han especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el componente se editó correctamente; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método obtiene un <xref:System.Type> matriz de tipos de control de página usando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> objeto y, a continuación, llama su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> método para mostrar el editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages" /> method must have been overridden to return a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> array of page control types.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages" /> método ha reemplazado para devolver un <see cref="T:System.Type" /> matriz de tipos de control de página.

trans-unit.source: This array must exist in order for the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent" /> method to succeed.
trans-unit.target: Esta matriz debe existir en orden para el <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent" /> método se realice correctamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el índice de la página inicial que se va a mostrar en el editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial page in the array.
trans-unit.target: Índice de la página inicial en la matriz.

trans-unit.source: The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
trans-unit.target: La página inicial se especifica cuando la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> se crea el objeto.
